amendment.description: To improve mental health screening and services for members of the Armed Forces.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4466 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4466 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6357) To improve mental health screening and services for members of the Armed Forces.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4466 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4466 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Boxer.
